sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"旅行"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: journey, tour, travel, trip, voyage, excursion, expedition, cruise
means: journey ： 最普通用词，侧重指时间较长、距离较远的单程陆上旅行，也指水上或空中的旅行。
tour ： 指最后反回出发地，旅途中有停留游览点，距离可长可短，目的各异的周游或巡行。
travel ： 泛指旅行的行为而不指某次具体的旅行，多指到远方作长期旅行，不强调直接目的地，单、复数均可用。
trip ： 普通用词，口语多用，常指为公务或游玩作的较短暂的旅行。
voyage ： 指在水上旅行，尤指海上旅行，也可指空中旅行。
excursion ： 较正式用词，常指不超过一天的短时期娱乐性游玩，也可指乘火车或轮船往返特定景点的远足旅游。
expedition ： 指有特定目的远征或探险。
cruise ： 主要指乘船的游览并在多处停靠。

sentence.Network_en: The average commuter journey there is five hours long.
sentence.Network_cn: 那里的通勤一族平均上下班要花5个小时。

sentence.Network_en: The journey ends in the ancient city of Marrakesh.
sentence.Network_cn: 旅行的终点是马拉喀什古城。

sentence.Network_en: Powell's unusual journey to high office is an inspiration to millions.
sentence.Network_cn: 鲍威尔升任高官的不寻常历程对数以百万计的人都是一个激励。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French jornee 'day, a day's travel, a day's work' (the earliest senses in English), based on Latin diurnum 'daily portion', from diurnus (see diurnal)

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 由东方神起演唱的《Journey》作为韩剧《天堂牧场》的主题曲，收录在《天堂牧场》OST Part.1和Part.2中。 专辑名称：天堂牧场OST Part.1 发行时间：2011. 01. 26 专辑曲目： 01.Journey (Original Sound Track Ver. 东方神起) 02. 可以喜欢你吗 F(X) 专辑名称：天堂牧场OST Part.2 发行时间：2011. 01. 31 专辑曲目： 01. Paradise Farm 02. Journey - 东方神起 & 徐贤 03. My Only One - 宝儿 04. Waiting For You -

entry.def: When you make a journey, you travel from one place to another.

example.ex: There is an express service from Paris which completes the journey to Bordeaux in under 4 hours.
example.tran: 从巴黎有快车前往波尔多，全程不到4个小时。

entry.def: You can refer to a person's experience of changing or developing from one state of mind to another as a journey.

example.ex: How do we go about embarking on this  'inner journey' to understand ourselves?...
example.tran: 我们该如何开始这个“心灵历程”来了解自己呢？

example.ex: My films try to describe a journey of discovery, both for myself and the watcher.
example.tran: 我的电影试图为我自己也为观众描述一个自我发现的心灵之旅。

entry.def: If you journey somewhere, you travel there.

example.ex: In February 1935, Naomi journeyed to the United States for the first time...
example.tran: 1935年2月，娜奥米第一次来到美国旅行。

example.ex: She has journeyed on horseback through Africa and Turkey.
example.tran: 她骑马游历了非洲和土耳其。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of traveling from one place to another

stems_affixes.value_cn: 定期刊物,杂志,日报;日志,日记
stems_affixes.word_buile: journ日期+al……的→n.定期刊物,杂志,日报;日志,日记
journal杂志,日报+ist人→n.记者,新闻工作者
journ日期+ey→n.旅行,旅程 v.旅行
ad加强,增加+journ日期→增加日期
journ日期+ey→n.旅行,旅程 v.旅行

Sentence.sentence: Last week I came across a couple of old school friends and we spend the entire journey in the bar.
Evidence of interdependence is everywhere; we are on this journey together.
When spring comes, they began their long journey north.
The question is often asked whether every butterfly makes the round trip journey every year
The last generation of the season about the forth may make the journey back in Mexico and restart the cycle.

means.word_mean: 旅行; 行程; （尤指长途）旅行，行程

sentences.en: I don't envy your journey in this bad weather.
sentences.cn: 我并不羡慕你在这样恶劣的天气里旅行。

sentences.en: He wishes to journey round the world.

jushi.english: Busy people measure their journeys not by miles but by time.
jushi.chinese: 公务繁忙的人不是以距离而是以时间来计算行程。

jushi.english: We have a long journey before us.
jushi.chinese: 我们还有很长的路要走。

jushi.english: The route of the journey was so arranged that we could have a three-day stay in New York City.
jushi.chinese: 这样安排旅行路线,以便我们可以在纽约停留三天。
